Lectures.Title: L1: Intro to Basic Drawing
Lectures.Description: The lecture covered the basics of what drawing means.

Lectures.Title: L2: Proper Pencil-Sharpening
Lectures.Description: This lecture focused on the proper method of hand-sharpening pencils for drawing.

Lectures.Title: L3: How To Draw Tree
Lectures.Description: The lecture covered how to draw a basic tree with all of its leaves gone.

Lectures.Title: L4: Pumpkin Drawing
Lectures.Description: The lecture went over interesting ways to draw spooky looking pumpkins

Lectures.Title: L5: Halloween Scenes
Lectures.Description: This lecture used aspects of previous lectures to prepare students for the Draw Halloween lab.

Labs.Title: Lab 1: Draw A Person
Labs.Description: Lab 1 was a general assignment designed to get students drawing. Stick figures were accepted.

Labs.Title: Lab 2: Draw Halloween
Labs.Description: Lab 2 involved students drawing what they thought represented the spookiness of Halloween.
